TopicTitle: Unlock All Nodes does not work

Articles.Content:
In the debug menu, when I use the "Unlock All Nodes" all the nodes unlock but after exiting and entering the R&D building all the nodes are locked again.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T22:48:01Z" title="07/06/2015 10:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by Shurikeeen**

I've got a modlet for this called [TreeToppler](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107663-1-0-x-Magico13-s-Modlets-%28Field-Experience-Sensible-Screenshot-etc-%29). Using TreeToppler you can unlock all the nodes and they will stay unlocked. [KerbalStuff Link](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/739/Tree%20Toppler)

>

Using TreeToppler you can unlock all the nodes and they will stay unlocked. [KerbalStuff Link](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/739/Tree%20Toppler)

Cheers! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
